ClockworkBeetle.description: Shining black elytra flitter on the back of a goat-sized bug.
ClockworkBeetle.description_ko: 염소만 한 크기의 벌레 등에서 반짝이는 검은 딱지날개가 파르르 떨린다.

Barkbiter.description: A beetle with mandibles designed for tearing through tree bark.
Barkbiter.description_ko: 나무 껍질을 찢기 위해 설계된 턱을 가진 딱정벌레.

Fire Beetle.description: A beetle with a glowing abdomen that can spit fire.
Fire Beetle.description_ko: 불을 뿜을 수 있는 빛나는 복부를 가진 딱정벌레.

Rhinoceros Beetle.description: A massive beetle with a prominent horn used for combat.
Rhinoceros Beetle.description_ko: 전투에 사용되는 눈에 띄는 뿔을 가진 거대한 딱정벌레.

Stag Beetle.description: A beetle with large mandibles resembling stag antlers.
Stag Beetle.description_ko: 사슴뿔을 닮은 커다란 턱을 가진 딱정벌레.

Scarab Beetle.description: A dung beetle that rolls balls of refuse across the sands.
Scarab Beetle.description_ko: 모래 위로 배설물 공을 굴리는 쇠똥구리.

Dung Beetle.description: A humble beetle that feeds on waste.

Bombardier Beetle.description: A beetle that sprays boiling chemicals from its abdomen.

Glowing Beetle.description: A bioluminescent beetle that lights up the darkness.

Sap Beetle.description: A beetle attracted to tree sap and sweet fluids.
Sap Beetle.description_ko: 나무 수액과 달콤한 액체에 끌리는 딱정벌레.

Jewel Beetle.description: A beetle with iridescent elytra that shimmer like gemstones.
Jewel Beetle.description_ko: 보석처럼 반짝이는 무지개빛 딱지날개를 가진 딱정벌레.

Giant Beetle.description: A beetle grown to enormous proportions.

Beetle Larva.description: The larval stage of a beetle, soft and vulnerable.
